replies.body: Or, and bear with me on this, that person knows how to use Zilean.
Guess you didn't notice the ARAM lol.
I did, but how is that relevant to skill? If the person truly knows how to use Zilean the fact it's an ARAM wouldn't make much of a difference.

It would make a difference, I've gotten those kinds of kills many times with champs i have no freakin idea how to play properly, its ARAM, throw skill out the door with that game mode, nonstop team-fights till the game ends making it incredibly easy to get kills, and for a Zilean? lol %%%%s piss easy just spam Q till the games over.
I'm not denying it makes a difference. All I'm saying is that, for someone who knows how to really use Zilean, it's not hard to get lots of kills.
Zilean he has that much experience with time, he has now perfected KSing.
